## kl context new

Create new context

### Synopsis

```
This command let create new context.
Example:
  # create new context
  kl context new

	# creating new context with name
	kl context new --name <context_name>
	
```

### Options

```
  -a, --account string   account name
  -c, --cluster string   cluster name
  -h, --help             help for new
  -n, --name string      context name
  -h, --help   help for new
```
